name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2012 3D
summary: This winter, Pro Evolution Soccer – the first and original 3D soccer game – makes its return to the Nintendo 3DS handheld system.  Pro Evolution Soccer 2012 3D is back!  This year, Konami is determined to give soccer fans on the go, a realistic, immersive and a delightfully playable take on the beautiful game.  The game is upgraded to provide a truly interactive football experience on the go.  Pro Evolution Soccer 2012 3D truly represents the key attributes of the game and its players. Pro Evolution Soccer… ”Can you play?”
